THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Reinforcement: The visual of a happy couple in bed directly reinforces the video's title about pleasing a wife in bed. The doctor’s image and credentials suggest expert advice, which matches the ‘Dr. Neha Mehta’ in the title.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: While the couple featured are Western/European in appearance, the text and intended audience are Hindi-speaking (Indian), which is a slight demographic mismatch but common in Indian YouTube thumbnails. The inclusion of the word 'राज़' (secret) in the thumbnail text aligns with the ‘राजी’ (willing/pleased) concept in the title, keeping the thematic link strong.
